channel.title: Moparscape problem playing
channel.description:
Hello guys!
i have a problem if i play moparscape the program crashes when i do two moves. Please help me out this i use a mac
greets siebje9

item.title: Moparscape problem playing
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

run it using -d32 as a params.
it will make it run in 32 bit jvm

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape problem playing
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Mac’s run on Shell scripts and struggle to cope with what Moparscape has to throw at them as they use batch/cmd prompt files and as they use shell script they do not recognise these and therefore crash as they don’t know whats going on!
Other reason is that Macs are nearly all 64-bit.
Therefore you need a special Batch file to enable it to run on 64-bit.
BUT, considering that mac’s don’t allow the use of batch files, it’s impossible.

All in all, it isn’t going to work, unless you can find a server that uses an .exe file as the Run/Play file.
(Even then I am not sure if it will be able to load the models and sprites, or even work for that sake).

Read full topic
